snippet.title: Arma 3 - Helicopters DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW - The Arma 3 Helicopters DLC is ready for take-off!

Fly the brand-new CH-67 Huron and Mi-290 Taru heavy-lift helicopters, win the gold in four exclusive helicopter Time Trial challenges, and master Sling Loading to provide ground support in the brand new Arma 3 Helicopters DLC!

The Helicopters DLC is supported by a free platform update, which features the new Support MP mode, helicopter VR training courses, and a variety of additional game objects for content creators. The free update also introduces three major new features: RotorLib advanced flight model, sling loading, and firing from vehicles.

For more information about Arma 3, be sure to check out http://www.arma3.com/.

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open - Arma 3 sends you to war.

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
